title: Ashampoo Photo Optimizer 6 v6 0 3-TE
description:
TE 2014 PRESENTS

ANOTHER FINE RELEASE

Release: Ashampoo Photo Optimizer 6 v6.0.3 (c) 2014 Ashampoo
Date: 08/31/2014

Cracked By: Twisted EndZ
Release Type: Serial, Other: Server Check Bypass, RegFile
RELEASE NOTES

Better-structured, more powerful and more efficient - Put the fun
back into image processing with Ashampoo Photo Optimizer 6!

Are your photos pale, overexposed or blurred? Are you lacking the
time, the knowledge or the motivation to carry out extensive
image optimizations? Ashampoo Photo Optimizer 6 revitalizes your
photos at the click of a button, effortlessly. Optimize colors
and contrasts, adjust the sharpness, remove scratches and noise
and realign your photos - fast, simple, no prior knowledge
required

Better-structured: Enhanced program structure and readability
More powerful: Smart algorithms, portrait tools, new effects
More efficient: Less resource-hungry, optimized for performance

One-click optimization for bright and brilliant photos

Gradual auto-optimization:
Don't have time for experiments? Simply select photo(s), hit
"Auto-Optimize" and Ashampoo Photo Optimizer 6 will have your
photo collection vamped up in no time. There just is no faster
way!

Portrait enhancements

Whiten teeth, remove red eyes and skin imperfections:
Get rid of discolored teeth, skin imperfections and other
blemishes! Ashampoo Photo Optimizer 6 makes your portraits shine

Image processing built-in

Rotate freely, crop and straighten horizontally:
Resize, rotate, realign or crop your photos. Adjust colors and
contrasts, whiten teeth and remove red eyes and skin
imperfections - out of the box, no extra tools needed

Creative tools

New Photo effects for creative image design:
Select between various creative image effects. How about a whiff
of nostalgia? Bring the charm and flair of past times to your
photos with the aging effect. You'll be amazed by how much life
is hidden in your photos!

Batch-processing

Batch processing:
Your photo library is huge? Manually reviewing and editing every
single file would take forever? No problem! Ashampoo Photo
Optimizer 6 processes your entire photo collection in one go
Save time and nerves

Made for explorers

Automatic backups:
Feel free to try out new things. Ashampoo Photo Optimizer
automatically creates backups of your original files. If
something goes awry, simply hit a button to restore your photos
to their original state. And thanks to the built-in before-after
view, you'll always know in advance what to expect from your
modifications

Sharing has never been easier

Photo sharing:
What good are brilliant photos that nobody sees? Use the built-in
email, Facebook and Picasa sharing features and share your photos
with others
Brand-new: Integrated Ashampoo webspace uploader

Photos are beautiful, beautiful photos are precious! Go from
mediocre to brilliant with just one click - with Ashampoo Photo
Optimizer 6

Requirements:

Operating System
Windows Vista , Windows 7, Windows 8

Software:
Microsoft .Net 4.0 Framework

Computer

Processor:
1 GHz Single Core Processor or higher
Multi-core processor recommended for optimized rendering

Harddisk space:
200 MB for installation
1 GB for temporary files (recommended)

Memory:
2 GB or more

Graphic Card:
Min. screen resolution 1280 x 1024 with true color support

IMPORTANT NOTICE:

As of 09/14/2013 ALL TE RAR archives will now be using the RAR5
standard. Please make sure to update to the latest version of
Winrar (at least Winrar v5.0) so you can extract the contents of
the *.001, *.002 etc... archives within the zip files. The
update is free, there is no reason not to update

TE Release Filename: tapo603x.zip

INSTALLATION NOTES

Install ashampoo_photo_optimizer_6_e6.0.3_sm.exe. Do not launch
Ashampoo Photo Optimizer 6 yet. Next import the registration.reg
file into your registry, which can be found in the Reg folder
Make sure you have administator mode if you have problems
importing the regfile. Ashampoo Photo Optimizer 6 is now fully
registered and activated!

Thats it! Enjoy

T E 2 0 1 4
